name: Jenga VR (Borderandry, LenSJ)
description:
CURRENTLY TESTED ON OCULUS QUEST WITH OCULUS LINK AND OCULUS RIFT

A multiplayer Jenga game in Virtual Reality, with a maximum of 4 players per lobby. Mess up with the other players and try to not make the tower fall!

Requires a Virtual Reality Headset and a Compatible Computer.

Credits:

-Andrea Rosini

-Lenny Steve Jox

https://lensj.itch.io/

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game A Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
